Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.calls

Interface RetryStrategy


  • public interface RetryStrategy
    Failed or timed-out call retry strategy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      NextAction doPotentialRetry​(Step conflictStep, Packet packet, io.kubernetes.client.ApiException e, int statusCode, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> responseHeaders)
      Called during ResponseStep.onFailure(Packet, ApiException, int, Map) to decide if another retry attempt will occur.
      void reset​()
      Called when retry count, or other statistics, should be reset, such as when partial list was returned and new request for next portion of list (continue) is invoked.
      void setRetryStep​(Step retryStep)
      Initialization that provides reference to step that should be invoked on a retry attempt

    • Method Detail

      • setRetryStep

        void setRetryStep​(Step retryStep)
        Initialization that provides reference to step that should be invoked on a retry attempt
        Parameters:
        retryStep - Retry step

      • doPotentialRetry

        NextAction doPotentialRetry​(Step conflictStep,
                            Packet packet,
                            io.kubernetes.client.ApiException e,
                            int statusCode,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> responseHeaders)
        Called during ResponseStep.onFailure(Packet, ApiException, int, Map) to decide if another retry attempt will occur.
        Parameters:
        conflictStep - Conflict step, or null
        packet - Packet
        e - ApiException thrown by Kubernetes client; will be null for simple timeout
        statusCode - HTTP response status code; will be 0 for simple timeout
        responseHeaders - HTTP response headers; will be null for simple timeout
        Returns:
        Desired next action which should specify retryStep. Return null when call will not be retried.

      • reset

        void reset​()
        Called when retry count, or other statistics, should be reset, such as when partial list was returned and new request for next portion of list (continue) is invoked.
